alert.note: Alert for Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Aroostook County through 615 PM EDT... At 533 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nine-mile Bridge, or 8 miles east of Lac Frontiere, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Pamphile, Nine-mile Bridge and Allagash Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Maine.
